maqras.text: 94|1|Ware wa, anata no mune o hirogenakatta ka.
94|2|Anata kara omoni o kudashitade wanai ka.
94|3|Sore wa, anata no senaka o oshitsukete ita.
94|4|Mata ware wa, anata no meisei o takametade wanai ka.
94|5|Hontoni kon'nan to tomoni, anraku wa ari,
94|6|hontoni kon'nan to tomoni, anraku wa aru.
94|7|Sore de (tomen no tsutome kara) raku ni nattara, sarani roku shite,
94|8|(tada hitosuji ni) anata no omo ni keito suruga i.
95|1|Ichijiku to oribu ni oite,
95|2|shinaizan ni oite,
95|3|mata heian'na kono machi ni oite (chikau).
95|4|Hontoni ware wa, ningen o mottomo utsukushi sugata ni tsukutta.
95|5|Sorekara ware wa, kare o mottomo hikuku sageta.
95|6|Shinko shite zenko ni isoshimu mono wa betsudearu. Kare-ra ni taishite wa hateshinai hosho ga arou.
95|7|Naze sore demo, omae wa shukyo (shinjitsu) o hitei suru no ka.
95|8|Arra wa, mottomo sugureta shinpan-shade wanai ka.
96|1|Yome,`sozo nasa reru okata, anata no omo no o nanioite.
96|2|Ichi gyoketsu kara, ningen o tsukura reta.'
96|3|Yome,`anata no omo wa, saiko no sonki de arare,
96|4|-hitsu ni yotte (kaku koto o) oshie rareta okata.
96|5|Ningen ni michi naru koto o oshie rareta okatadearu.'
96|6|Iya, ningen wa hontoni hogaide,
96|7|jibun de nani mo tarinai tokoro wa nai to kangaete iru.
96|8|Hontoni anata no omo ni (subete no mono wa) kisa reru nodearu.
96|9|Anata wa, soshi suru mono o mita ka,
96|10|hitori no shimo be (muhanmado) ga, reihai o sasageru toki ni.
96|11|Anata wa, kare (soshi suru mono) ga,(tadashi michi) ni michibika rete iru to omou no ka.
96|12|Keishin o susumete iru ka,
96|13|(shinri o) usodearu to shite se o muketa to omou no ka.
96|14|Kare wa, arra ga mite ora reru koto o shiranai no ka.
96|15|Danjite sode wanai. Moshi kare ga tome nainaraba, ware wa maegami de kare o toraerudearou,
96|16|uso-tsuki de, tsumibukai maegami o.
96|17|Soshite kare no (kyujo no tame ni) ichimi o shoshu sa se nasai.
96|18|Ware wa kanshu (no tenshi) o shoshu surudearou.
96|19|Danjite so arubekide wanai. Anata wa kare ni shitagatte wa naranai. Ichizu ni sajida shite (omoni) chikadzuke. 〔Sajida〕
97|1|hontoni ware wa, mitsu no yoru ni, kono (kuruan) o kudashita.
97|2|Mitsu no yoru ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka.
97|3|Mitsu no yoru wa, sen tsuki yori mo masaru.
97|4|(Sono yoru) tenshi-tachi to seirei wa,-nushi no yurushi no moto ni, subete no kami inochi o motarashite kudaru.
97|5|Akatsuki no akeru made,(soreha) heiandearu.
98|1|Keiten'notami no naka (shinri o) kyohi shita mono mo tashinkyo to mo, kare-ra ni meisho ga kuru made,(-do kara) hanareyou to shinakatta.
98|2|Mata arra kara no shito ga, jun Seina shokan o, yonde kika seru made wa.
98|3|Sono nakaniha, fumetsu no tadashi kiroku (okite) ga aru.
98|4|Keiten o sazukatte iru-sha-tachi ga, bunpa shita no wa, meisho ga kare-ra ni kite kara ato no kotodeatta.

98|5|Kare-ra no meiji rareta koto wa, tada arra ni tsukae, kare ni shinjin no makoto o tsukushi, junsei ni fukuju, kie shite, reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha o shi nasai to, iu dake no kotodeatta. Kore koso shinsei no oshiedearu.
98|6|Keiten'notami no naka (shinri o) kyohi shita mono mo, tashinkyo to mo, jigoku no hi ni (nagekoma re)te, sono naka ni eien ni sumu. Korera wa, shujo no naka saiaku no monodearu.
98|7|Daga shinko shite zenko ni isoshimu-sha-tachi, korera wa, shujo no naka saizen no monodearu.

98|8|Kare-ra e no hosho wa,-nushi no omoto no, kawa ga shita o nagareru eien no endearu. Eien ni sono naka ni sumudearou. Arra wa kare-ra o yorokoba re, kare-ra mo kare ni man'etsu suru. Sore wa omo o osoreru mono (e no hosho)dearu.
99|1|Daichi ga hageshiku yure,
99|2|daichi ga sono omoni o nagedashi,
99|3|`kare (daichi) ni nanigoto ga okotta no ka.' To hito ga iu toki.
99|4|Sonohi (daichi wa) subete no shosoku o katarou,
99|5|anata no omo ga keiji sa reta koto o.
99|6|Sonohi, hitobito wa bunbetsu sa reta shudan to natte (chichu kara) susumidete, kare-ra no okonatta koto ga shimesa rerudearou.
99|7|Ichimijin no omo-sa demo, zen o okonatta mono wa sore o miru.
99|8|Ichimijin no omo-sa demo, aku o okonatta mono wa sore o miru.
100|1|Hakuiki araku shingeki suru (uma) ni oite (chikau).
100|2|Hidzume ni hibana o chirashi,
100|3|akatsuki ni kyushu shite,
100|4|sajin o makiage,
100|5|(teki no) gunzei no mattadanaka ni totsunyu suru toki.
100|6|Hontoni ningen wa, jibun no omo ni taishi onshirazudearu.
100|7|Sore ni tsuki, kare wa makotoni shonindeari,
100|8|mata tomi o aisuru koto ni netchu suru.
